items.title: Awesome Cybersecurity Blueteam
items.content_text:
### Security monitoring / Network Security Monitoring (NSM)

*   [VAST (‚≠ê686)](https://github.com/tenzir/vast) - Free and open-source network telemetry engine for data-driven security investigations.
*   [Zeek](https://zeek.org/) - Powerful network analysis framework focused on security monitoring, formerly known as Bro.
items.content_html:
Security monitoring / Network Security Monitoring (NSM)

  • VAST (‚≠ê686) - Free and open-source network telemetry engine for data-driven security investigations.
  • Zeek - Powerful network analysis framework focused on security monitoring, formerly known as Bro.

items.title: Awesome Bioie
items.content_text:
### Code Libraries / Pre-LLM Guides, Lectures, and Courses

*   [Med7](https://medium.com/@kormilitzin/med7-clinical-information-extraction-system-in-python-and-spacy-5e6f68ab1c68) - [paper](https://arxiv.org/abs/2003.01271) - [code (‚≠ê218)](https://github.com/kormilitzin/med7) - a Python package and model (for use with spaCy) for doing NER with medication-related concepts.
items.content_html:
Code Libraries / Pre-LLM Guides, Lectures, and Courses

  • Med7 - paper - code (‚≠ê218) - a Python package and model (for use with spaCy) for doing NER with medication-related concepts.

items.title: Awesome Ada
items.content_text:
### Algorithms, Containers and Protocols / Apache License

*   [ada-lsp (‚≠ê11)](https://github.com/reznikmm/ada-lsp) - Language Server Protocol for Ada.
*   [ada-lsp-client (‚≠ê1)](https://github.com/Alex-Gamper/Ada-LanguageServer) - Prototype implementation of LSP client - Visual Studio 2017.

### Cryptography / Apache License

*   [fletcher (‚≠ê0)](https://github.com/darkestkhan/fletcher) - Trivial implementation of fletcher\_16 checksum computation algorithm.
*   [base58-ada (‚≠ê3)](https://github.com/MichaelAllenHardeman/base58_ada) - Base58 encoding and decoding in Ada.
*   [libsparkcrypto (‚≠ê28)](https://github.com/Componolit/libsparkcrypto) - A cryptographic library implemented in SPARK.
*   [sip-hash (‚≠ê1)](https://github.com/grim7reaper/SipHash) - A pure Ada implementation of the SipHash PRF.
*   [libkeccak (‚≠ê36)](https://github.com/damaki/libkeccak) - A SPARK implementation of the Keccak family of sponge functions and related constructions.
*   [ascon-spark (‚≠ê3)](https://github.com/jhumphry/Ascon_SPARK) - Ada/SPARK implementation of the Ascon Authenticated Encryption with Additional Data Algorithm.
*   [spark-sip-hash (‚≠ê5)](https://github.com/jhumphry/SPARK_SipHash) - Ada/SPARK implementation of the SipHash keyed hash function.
*   [spark-norx (‚≠ê8)](https://github.com/jhumphry/SPARK_NORX) - Ada/SPARK implementation of the NORX Authenticated Encryption with Additional Data Algorithm.
*   [stotp (‚≠ê9)](https://github.com/jklmnn/STOTP) - Timed One-Time-Pad (RFC 6238) implementation in SPARK.
*   [xxhash-ada (‚≠ê1)](https://github.com/lyarbean/xxhash-ada) - Extremely fast non-cryptographic Hash algorithm, xxhash is working at speeds close to RAM limits.
items.content_html:
Algorithms, Containers and Protocols / Apache License

  • ada-lsp (‚≠ê11) - Language Server Protocol for Ada.
  • ada-lsp-client (‚≠ê1) - Prototype implementation of LSP client - Visual Studio 2017.

Cryptography / Apache License

  • fletcher (‚≠ê0) - Trivial implementation of fletcher_16 checksum computation algorithm.
  • base58-ada (‚≠ê3) - Base58 encoding and decoding in Ada.
  • libsparkcrypto (‚≠ê28) - A cryptographic library implemented in SPARK.
  • sip-hash (‚≠ê1) - A pure Ada implementation of the SipHash PRF.
  • libkeccak (‚≠ê36) - A SPARK implementation of the Keccak family of sponge functions and related constructions.
  • ascon-spark (‚≠ê3) - Ada/SPARK implementation of the Ascon Authenticated Encryption with Additional Data Algorithm.
  • spark-sip-hash (‚≠ê5) - Ada/SPARK implementation of the SipHash keyed hash function.
  • spark-norx (‚≠ê8) - Ada/SPARK implementation of the NORX Authenticated Encryption with Additional Data Algorithm.
  • stotp (‚≠ê9) - Timed One-Time-Pad (RFC 6238) implementation in SPARK.
  • xxhash-ada (‚≠ê1) - Extremely fast non-cryptographic Hash algorithm, xxhash is working at speeds close to RAM limits.

items.title: Awesome WSL
items.content_text:
### WSL Tools / WSL Utilities

*   [WslShortcut](https://github.com/sirredbeard/awesome-wsl/blob/main//github.com/HanabishiRecca/WslShortcut) - Run WSL commands directly in Windows. Also allows to use WSL `git`/`node`/etc. in **Visual Studio Code** or another software. Combines functionality of utilities like [`wslgit`](https://github.com/sirredbeard/awesome-wsl/blob/main//github.com/andy-5/wslgit), [`wslnodejs`](https://github.com/sirredbeard/awesome-wsl/blob/main//github.com/snooopcatt/wslnodejs), [`wslexec`](https://github.com/sirredbeard/awesome-wsl/blob/main//github.com/int128/wslexec) etc. with simpler usage. ![github project](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/sirredbeard/Awesome-WSL/master/github-icon.png)
items.content_html:
WSL Tools / WSL Utilities

  • WslShortcut - Run WSL commands directly in Windows. Also allows to use WSL git/node/etc. in Visual Studio Code or another software. Combines functionality of utilities like wslgit, wslnodejs, wslexec etc. with simpler usage.
